name: Litchi mousse Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Litchi mousse Recipe: Litchi 24 peel (remove skin) Cream 400 gm Gelatin 1 tsp heaped dissolved in ¼ cup water Coconut milk ½ cup Sugar 6 tbsp Cherries for decoration
instructions: In a blender, blend litchi, cream, sugar, coconut milk, add to it dissolved gelatin. Blend well. Remove and pour in serving glasses. Decorate with litchis, cherries and piped cream.
